name: Damage up
description: +5 flat damage to your %s.

name: Critical chance
description: +5% critical hit chance (exceeding critical hit chance converts to % critical damage) to your %s.

name: Prayer
description: Remove a random curse and heal for %d.

name: Luck
description: +2.5% item rarity chance.

name: Highroll
description: Re-roll current items present on the floor (does not remove their curses if any).

name: Damage up (dual)
description: +2.5 flat damage to %s.

name: Attack speed up (dual)
description: +15% attack speed to %s.

name: Hitter
description: Remove all of your attack speed, gain +5 flat damage to %s for each removed stack.

name: Gambler
description: Remove all of your attack speed, gain 5% critical chance to your %s for each removed stack.

name: Prayer (dual)
description: Remove a random curse from each hand (2 in total) and heal for %d.

name: Damage up (dual)
description: +5 flat damage to %s.

name: Critical damage
description: +10% critical damage to %s.

name: Curse advantage
description: +5 flat damage to your %s for each curse in your other hand.

name: Curse advantage
description: +5 flat damage to your %s for each curse in this hand.

name: Survivor
description: +1 flat damage to your %s for each 5 health points missing.

name: Critical chance
description: +5% critical hit chance (exceeding critical hit chance converts to % critical damage) to %s.

name: Pistol
description: Equip a pistol in your %s, shoots a slower piercing projectile dealing damage every tick it is in contact with the target.

name: Extra shot
description: Shoots an additional projectile with your %.

name: Curse advantage
description: +5 flat damage to your %s for each of your curses from both hands.

name: Change of mind
description: Replace all items in your %s by those from your other hand.

name: Homing
description: Projectiles from your %s are homing.

name: Sync
description: Fire %s at the same time.

name: Mimic
description: Your %s becomes a perfect clone of your other hand (copies all its items and curses).

name: Relaxed
description: -8% attack speed to %s.

name: Clumsy
description: -20% critical damage to your %s.

name: Scared
description: -5% maximum health.

name: Inaccurate
description: Miss 12.5% more shots with your %s.

name: Heavy
description: -12.5% projectile speed with your %s.

name: Trap
description: Take a hit for %d points of your current health.

name: Lowroll
description: Re-roll current items present on the floor (does not remove their curses if any).

name: Sabotage
description: Add 5 extra random curses spread among current items present on the floor.

name: Soft
description: -10 flat damage to your %s.

name: Fake
description: The next item you pick for your %s will be a random different item.

name: Love
description: When your %s hits the target, the target is moved instantly by an additional step in your direction (inverse knockback).
